timeline.message:
Fix typo in docs

Some hyphens were swapped for question marks in bf4c364. Swap them back.

timeline.bodyText:
Em dashes are the preferred punctuation here.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            By default, shard placement - or `routing` - is controlled by using a
          
          
            
            By default, shard placement -- or `routing` -- is controlled by using a
timeline.author: jrodewig
timeline.diffHunk:
